Q_DESC: Robot needs to ask user for their name. Then display their name to prove that you can recall it. Ask them for their age. Then display what their age would be five years from now. Then display what was their age five years ago.
TESTCASE_1:
John
29
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
In five years you will be 34 years old!
Five years ago you were 24 years old!
Imagine that!
TESTCASE_2:
Roy
35
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
In five years you will be 40 years old!
Five years ago you were 30 years old!
Imagine that!
TESTCASE_3:
Henry
30
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
In five years you will be 35 years old!
Five years ago you were 25 years old!
Imagine that!
